name: Monochrome Memories
description:
Monochrome Memories is a 2D puzzle platformer about two siblings trying to reunite and overcome their parents' divorce. Play as both characters and help each other through each puzzle with special abilities

Created by Team Scumstone:

Andrew Steven Chau: Project Lead/Programmer

Elaine Chieng: Artist/Writer

Tiffany Lam: Designer/Programmer

Jessica Lim: Sound Designer
